member.name: M:PIManager.DAO.ProjectAccess.getInscriptions(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets list of inscriptions for a given person
member.returns: A list containing the project the person is subscribed to or an empty list
member.param: Id of a person connected to the system

member.name: M:PIManager.DAO.ProjectAccess.saveInscription(System.Int32,System.Int32)

member.returns: true if inscription has been done, otherwise false

member.name: M:PIManager.DAO.ProjectAccess.cancelInscription(System.Int32)
member.summary: Unsubscribe a student from a project.
member.returns: true if subscription has been canceled, otherwise false

member.summary: Adds a document to a project
member.returns: true if adding has been done, otherwise false

member.name: M:PIManager.DAO.ProjectAccess.checkPeriodInscriptionOpen
member.summary: Checks if the period of inscription to the projects is still opened.
member.returns: true if it is opened, otherwise false

member.name: M:PIManager.DAO.ProjectAccess.getProjects
member.summary: Get all the projects that are not opened to show, modify or inherit them
member.returns: A list of projects

member.summary: Get a project with all its informations

member.param: The id of hte project to retrieve

member.summary: Add a new project to the database
member.param: The list if technologies associated with this new project
Bytes representing the image posted to add to the description of the project

member.summary: Modify an existing project from the database
member.returns: true if the project has been added, false otherwise (the project doesn't exist or has been modified before by someone else)
member.param: The informations of the project before modifying it
The new informations to put for this project
The list if technologies associated with this project
Image posted to add to the description of the project
